testcase.classname: End To End Functionality of Flight Reservation Application
testcase.name: Verify End To End Functionality of Flight Reservation Application
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page of Flight Reservation...........................passed When user enters valid "mercury" and "mercury"..............................passed And clicks on signIn Image..................................................passed Then verify "Find a Flight: Mercury Tours:".................................passed When user enters flight details like "London" and "Paris" and "Blue Skies Airlines".passed And clicks on Find Flights..................................................passed And clicks on Reserve Flights...............................................passed And user enters passenger details like "Rajendra" and "Mahapatra" and "9861688595".passed And clicks on Buy Flights...................................................passed Then Booking Confirmation Text is displayed.................................passed And close Application.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Login Functionality by providing valid user credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page of Flight Reservation...........................passed When user enters valid "mercury" and "mercury"..............................passed And clicks on signIn Image..................................................passed Then user should be loggin successfully.....................................passed And close Application.......................................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Login Functionali with valid and invalid credentials
